This technique allows the user to create a large, humanoid creature composed of rock that can either be expelled from the user's mouth, or formed from a pre-existing source of earth. Depending on the user, the golem can be formed instantly.<ref name="Chpt563">''Naruto'' chapter 563, page 10</ref> 

The size of the [[Wikipedia:Golem|golem]] differs depending on use, but it always possesses an ample amount of brute strength, being able to bite and tear through a [[Spore Technique|White Zetsu clone]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 466, page 13</ref> It is very durable, being able to withstand a point-blank [[Explosive Clay: Bird|explosion]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 514, page 3</ref> This makes the golem ideal for serving as additional support or simply as a mobile shield.<ref name="Chpt563"/>

== Trivia ==
* Similar to many techniques from [[Kumogakure]], the name for this technique is an English word given kanji that somewhat matches its pronunciation.
